results.content: The content of the course is good but the accent is a little hard to understand. If the instructor can add CC it would be better for future learners. No git hub repository is provided and when you're having doubts it takes instructor 15-20 days to reply. I'd suggest you to take some other course and this one if you want to build a ecommerce app in short duration without understanding anything properly.
